name: opencode-background-agents
description: Delegate long-running tasks to background AI agents that work asynchronously while you continue with other work, with persistent context and progress tracking.

installation.summary: Install via npm to enable asynchronous background task delegation with persistent context and progress monitoring.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install -g opencode-background-agents
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugin": ["opencode-background-agents"]
}
```

Restart OpenCode to enable background agent capabilities.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

### Starting Background Tasks
Delegate work to background agents:

```
/background start "Refactor the authentication module to use OAuth2"
/background start "Write comprehensive tests for the API layer"
/background start "Update all dependencies and fix breaking changes"
```

### Monitoring Progress
```bash
/background list        # View all background tasks
/background status <id> # Check specific task status
/background logs <id>   # View task execution logs
```

### Task Management
```bash
/background pause <id>  # Pause a running task
/background resume <id> # Resume a paused task
/background stop <id>   # Stop and remove a task
/background results <id> # View completed task results
```

### Features
- **Async Execution**: Tasks run in the background
- **Persistent Context**: Agents maintain project knowledge
- **Progress Tracking**: Real-time status updates
- **Result Retrieval**: Get outputs when ready
- **Multi-tasking**: Run multiple agents simultaneously

### Example Workflow
```
# Start long-running tasks
/background start "Migrate database to PostgreSQL"
/background start "Implement dark mode theme"

# Continue working on other things
/background list
> Task 1: Database migration [In Progress - 45%]
> Task 2: Dark mode [Completed]

# Check results when ready
/background results 2
```

### Best For
- Large refactoring tasks
- Comprehensive test writing
- Documentation generation
- Dependency updates
- Performance optimization
